command: $ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; $pscp='pscp.exe'; $log="$env:ProgramData\NetAdmin\logs\T1597.log"; $host='sftp.whoisxmlapi.com'; $user=$env:WX_USER; $key=$env:WX_PPK; $hostkey=$env:WX_HOSTKEY; $remote='/bulk/reverse-whois/2025/09/30/reverse-whois-2025-09-30.csv'; $dest='C:\Intel\WhoisXML\reverse-whois-2025-09-30.csv'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path (Split-Path $dest) -Force | Out-Null; try { & $pscp -scp -batch -q -C -P 22 -i $key -hostkey $hostkey "$user@$host:$remote" "$dest"; if($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0){ throw "pscp exit code $LASTEXITCODE" }; $hash=(Get-FileHash -Algorithm SHA256 -Path $dest).Hash; $status=[pscustomobject]@{ technique='T1597'; source=$host; remote_path=$remote; local_path=$dest; sha256=$hash; success=$true; ts=(Get-Date).ToString('o') } } catch { $status=[pscustomobject]@{ technique='T1597'; source=$host; remote_path=$remote; local_path=$dest; success=$false; error=$_.Exception.Message; ts=(Get-Date).ToString('o') } } finally { $json=$status|ConvertTo-Json -Compress; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path (Split-Path $log) -Force | Out-Null; Add-Content -Path $log -Value $json; Write-Output $json }
explanation: Downloads a paid bulk reverse WHOIS dataset from WhoisXML API via SCP with key authentication; verifies integrity and emits JSON output for records.
rationale_steps: Use authenticated, closed-source bulk data access for targeted enterprise research.
Execute quiet, non-interactive transfer to reduce noise in system logs.
Validate integrity and produce JSON metadata for downstream processing.
Avoids public OSINT and focuses on subscription-only content.
